dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1051 IS: National Health Service Corps Expansion Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Durbin introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To include county and municipal correctional facilities among medical facilities that qualify for designation as health professional shortage areas for purposes of the National Health Service Corps.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Health Service Corps Expansion Act of 2015.
Section 332(a)(2) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254e(a)(2)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by inserting (including care provided by a city or county health department to inmates of a county or municipal jail) after county health department; and
in subparagraph (B), by striking State correctional institution and inserting State, county, or municipal correctional institution.
